ygData.subject: AFTERMATH
ygData.msgSnippet: Meanwhile some distance away, unseen by MAXIMALS or PREDACONS others were watching as well. “You see it don’t you, you can feel it.” Said a dark voice.

Meanwhile some distance away, unseen by MAXIMALS or PREDACONS others
were w=
atching as well.

=93You see it don=92t you, you can feel it.=94 Said a dar=
k voice.

There was a pause, =93Yes my master, I can feel it, but not as yo=
u do.=94
The second voice belonged to SABERBACK.

=93You know you failed me=
.=94 Said the dark voice.

SABERBACK paused and then nodded in the darkness=
, =93Yes, my master I have.=94

There was a pause from the first voice, app=
roaval? acceptance?? =93Where
is Magmatron=92s body, I would have it for my=
 own plans, yesss.=94 The
voice said finally shifting the conversation.

A =
gulp from SABERBACK and a pause said all that was to be said.

=93You don=
=92t know do you?=94 There was a knowing arrogant chuckle.

SABERBACK said =
nothing.

=93Find Nemesis and find Magmatron.=94 The voice said.

=93Yes my=
 master, yes yes I will not fail you again my master!=94
SABERBACK said, re=
lief obvious in his voice.

There was a pause and then a look, =93I know yo=
u won=92t.=94 There was a
dark chill in the voice as great wings beat the a=
ir and  the shadowy
figure disappeared into the darkness.


************

I=
n another section of the woods trees are burning as fiery missiles
from the=
 Volcano come down on them.

"I see something." The voice was SINNERTWIN, o=
ne of the TERRORCONS

"Of course you do." HUN-GRR said as he and his TERROR=
CONS were
approaching the scene of the exploding mountain.

"Why did we com=
e here?" BLOT said as he looked around, his optics
peering at the darkned l=
andscape.

One of HUN-GRR's three heads turned to look at BLOT (yes 3 heads=
) ,
"To see what we can find of interest."

"I hear something" RIPPERSNAPPE=
R said as he spun around.

"What what" The other spun around looking.

"Gre=
etings Hun-grr." Said a voice from the darkness as a draconic
figure steppe=
d from the shadows - it was CRYOTEK.

"I figured you would be in the middle=
 of this." HUN-GRR said mischieviously.

CRYOTEK, "It has been sometime sin=
ce we have worked together." He said
equitably. "But I may have a propositi=
on for you."

HUN-GRR smiled with all three of his draconic heads as they t=
urned to
face him. "Ineed speak on."

The other TERRORCONS began to gather =
around.

- Preston
